verses.verse: And when <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%>, great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, there came <S%G2064><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%>, thou canst <S%G1410><s%> make <S%G2511><s%> me clean <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> stretched forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%>, and touched <S%G680><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, I will <S%G2309><s%>; be thou made clean <S%G2511><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> leprosy <S%G3014><s%> was cleansed <S%G2511><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> thou tell <S%G2036><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> go <S%G5217><s%>, show <S%G1166><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest <S%G2409><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%>, for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1525><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> was entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%>, there came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a centurion <S%G1543><s%>, beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> lieth <S%G906><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, grievously <S%G1171><s%> tormented <S%G928><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will come and <S%G2064><s%> heal <S%G2323><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the centurion <S%G1543><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G5346><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest come <S%G1525><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> roof <S%G4721><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> say the word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> shall be healed <S%G2390><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> also am <S%G1510><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> myself soldiers <S%G4757><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> one <S%G4198><s%>, Go, and <S%G2532><s%> he goeth <S%G4198><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1401><s%> another <S%G243><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he cometh <S%G2064><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1401><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%>, Do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he doeth it <S%G4160><s%>.

And when <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G2296><s%>, he marvelled, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them that followed <S%G190><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, I have <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, no <S%G3761><s%>, not in <S%G1722><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east <S%G395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the west <S%G1424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall sit down <S%G347><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> shall be cast forth <S%G1544><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>: there <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> the weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth <S%G3599><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto the centurion <S%G1543><s%>, Go thy way <S%G5217><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> thou hast believed <S%G4100><s%>, so be it done <S%G1096><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G846><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> was healed <S%G2390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>'s house <S%G3614><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G3994><s%>'s mother lying <S%G906><s%> sick <S%G2532><s%> of a fever <S%G4445><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he touched <S%G680><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she arose <S%G1453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

And when <S%G1161><s%> even <S%G3798><s%> was come <S%G1096><s%>, they brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> possessed with demons <S%G1139><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he cast out <S%G1544><s%> the spirits <S%G4151><s%> with <S%G3056><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that were <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%>:

that <S%G3704><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>: Himself <S%G846><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bare <S%G941><s%> our diseases <S%G3554><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he gave commandment <S%G2753><s%> to depart <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the other side <S%G4008><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> a <S%G1520><s%> scribe <S%G1122><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Teacher <S%G1320><s%>, I <S%G1437><s%> will follow <S%G190><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> whithersoever <S%G3699><s%> thou goest <S%G565><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, The foxes <S%G258><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> holes <S%G5454><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the heaven <S%G3772><s%> have nests <S%G2682><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> to lay <S%G2827><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> of <S%G3101><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, suffer <S%G2010><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bury <S%G2290><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> leave <S%G863><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> to bury <S%G2290><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> own dead <S%G3498><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G1684><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a boat <S%G4143><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, there arose <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> tempest <S%G4578><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> was covered <S%G2572><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the waves <S%G2949><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was asleep <S%G2518><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4334><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and awoke <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Save <S%G4982><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>; we <S%G2248><s%> perish <S%G622><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> are ye <S%G2075><s%> fearful <S%G1169><s%>, O ye of little faith <S%G3640><s%>? Then <S%G5119><s%> he arose <S%G1453><s%>, and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> calm <S%G1055><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> marvelled <S%G2296><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, What manner of man <S%G4217><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2064><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the other side <S%G4008><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Gadarenes <S%G1086><s%>, there met <S%G5221><s%> him <S%G846><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> possessed with demons <S%G1139><s%>, coming forth <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tombs <S%G3419><s%>, exceeding <S%G3029><s%> fierce <S%G5467><s%>, so that <S%G1565><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> could pass <S%G3928><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> way <S%G3598><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, they cried out <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> have we <S%G2254><s%> to do <S%G2532><s%> with thee <S%G4671><s%>, thou <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>? art thou come <S%G2064><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%> to torment <S%G928><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%>?
Now <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> afar off <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> a herd <S%G34><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding <S%G1006><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the demons <S%G1142><s%> besought <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou cast <S%G1544><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1544><s%>, send <S%G2010><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the herd <S%G34><s%> of swine <S%G5519><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go <S%G5217><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> they came out <S%G1831><s%>, and went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the swine <S%G5519><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, the whole <S%G3956><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> rushed <S%G3729><s%> down <S%G2596><s%> the steep <S%G2911><s%> into the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> perished <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they that fed them <S%G1006><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, and told <S%G518><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> what was befallen <S%G3588><s%> to them that were possessed with demons <S%G1139><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> came out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> meet <S%G4877><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, they besought <S%G3870><s%> him that <S%G3704><s%> he would depart <S%G3327><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> borders <S%G3725><s%>.
